Resources

BEN Playbook

When you join BEN you get access to four year's worth of content, lesson plans, activities, and how-to guides put together by BEN leaders, students, alumni, partners, and supporters. You may be a developer, business leader, researcher, mathematician, economist, computer scientist, law student, political scientist, philosopher, or something in between. With all of your help, we will use blockchain to make a real impact on society.
